about_us_text: We are an innovative platform dedicated to facilitating access to quality healthcare services. We connect patients with the best medical professionals quickly and securely.
appointments_subtitle: Manage and view your scheduled appointments
billing_signin_prompt: Sign in to manage your billing.
cardiology_text: Specialized care for heart and cardiovascular system problems.
dermatology_text: Skin care and treatment of dermatological diseases.
chatbot_greeting: Hello! I'm Luna, your VirtualAid assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot_r_contact:
You can contact us by:
üìß Email: info@virtualaid.com
üìû Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567
üí¨ WhatsApp: Click the WhatsApp button at the top
üïí Hours: Mon - Fri: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM

We also have 24/7 support available.
chatbot_r_default:
Thank you for your message. I can help you with information about:
‚Ä¢ Medical specialties
‚Ä¢ How to schedule appointments
‚Ä¢ Consultation prices
‚Ä¢ Contact information
‚Ä¢ Contact via WhatsApp

What topic would you like to know more about?
chatbot_r_greeting:
Hello! Welcome to VirtualAid. I am here to help you with:
‚Ä¢ Information about our specialties
‚Ä¢ How to schedule an appointment
‚Ä¢ Prices and services
‚Ä¢ Contact details

How can I assist you?
chatbot_r_how:
To schedule an appointment, follow these steps:
1. Click 'Sign Up' in the menu
2. Select the specialty you need
3. Choose an available date and time
4. Confirm your booking

Would you like me to redirect you to registration?
chatbot_r_prices:
Our prices vary by specialty:
‚Ä¢ Pediatrics: From $50
‚Ä¢ Dermatology: From $60
‚Ä¢ Gynecology: From $70
‚Ä¢ Cardiology: From $80
‚Ä¢ Traumatology: From $90
‚Ä¢ Neurology: From $100

All prices are transparent, no surprises.
chatbot_r_specialties:
We have the following specialties available:
‚Ä¢ Cardiology - From $80
‚Ä¢ Dermatology - From $60
‚Ä¢ Pediatrics - From $50
‚Ä¢ Gynecology - From $70
‚Ä¢ Traumatology - From $90
‚Ä¢ Neurology - From $100

Are you interested in any particular one?
chatbot_r_whatsapp:
Perfect! You can contact us directly via WhatsApp by clicking the green üí¨ button at the top of the chat. It will automatically redirect you to our WhatsApp with a predefined message.

Is there anything else I can help you with?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.highlight: At VirtualAid we protect your personal information with the greatest care. Below you'll find a clear summary of how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
paragraphs: We value your privacy and are committed to keeping your personal data secure. This policy describes the measures we apply to protect your information and the way we use it within the platform.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
list: Registration data such as name, email address, and encrypted password.
Usage information related to your appointments, specialties consulted, and messages.
Technical data such as IP address, device type, and browser used.

sections.title: 3. How We Use the Information
list: Manage your account, medical appointments, and associated reminders.
Improve our services and personalize the platform experience.
Send relevant communications about your activity or updates to VirtualAid.

sections.title: 4. Sharing Information
paragraphs: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless it is essential to provide the service (for example, with healthcare professionals linked to your appointment) or when there is a legal obligation.

sections.title: 5. Security
paragraphs: We implement technical and organizational measures‚Äîincluding encryption, access controls, and periodic audits‚Äîto prevent unauthorized access, loss, or misuse of information.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
paragraphs: You can request access to, rectification of, or deletion of your personal data at any time. Contact our support channel and we will prioritise your request.

sections.title: 7. Changes to the Policy
paragraphs: We may update this policy when we introduce new services or due to regulatory requirements. If we make significant changes, we will notify you before they take effect.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.highlight: By using VirtualAid you agree to these conditions, designed to ensure a safe and reliable service for both patients and healthcare professionals.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of the Terms
paragraphs: Accessing or using the platform implies full acceptance of these terms. If you disagree with any of the conditions described, you must refrain from using VirtualAid.

sections.title: 2. Use of the Platform
list: You must provide truthful, complete, and up-to-date information in your account.
Fraudulent, abusive, or harmful use that affects other users is prohibited.
We may suspend or limit access if irregular activities are detected.

sections.title: 3. Intellectual Property
paragraphs: The content, trademarks, and technological developments of VirtualAid belong to the platform or its licensors. Reproduction without prior written authorisation is prohibited.

sections.title: 4. Liability
paragraphs: VirtualAid acts as a technological intermediary and is not responsible for clinical decisions or information provided directly by healthcare professionals.

sections.title: 5. Modifications
paragraphs: We reserve the right to update these terms to reflect service improvements or regulatory changes. We will notify you of significant modifications with reasonable notice.

sections.title: 6. Governing Law
paragraphs: These terms are governed by the legislation in force in your country of residence and any dispute will be submitted to the competent courts accordingly.
